subject: Re: WAV files people use WAS: My First File
author: Rebecca
full_text:
Misty shared:
>Ive tried all kinds of stuff. Musical notes, snippets of dialogue in 
>multiple languages, allophones, crowd noise, me saying "the quick
>brown fox.." pangram worked very well. If you want I can send you a
>few that have worked for me or upload them to my esnips.

Yes, please email them to me off list!  Of post them in a file.

I'd love to experiment. 

Blessings,

Becca
